title: Learning technology skills for independence
content:
Scenario: Learning technology skills for independence
    Given Jordan wants to use a smartphone more independently
    And technology skills increase autonomy
    When Jordan takes assistive technology training
    Then instruction is patient, repetitive, and accessible
    And the trainer adapts to Jordan's learning pace
    And Jordan practices each skill until it becomes comfortable
    And the personal_agent provides ongoing coaching
    And Jordan's technology capability increases over time
    And Jordan experiences growing independence through skill development
